template_content:
Certificate of Excellence

Awarded to

%FULL_NAME%

For demonstrating exceptional skills in

%QUIZ_NAME%

Awarded on: %DATE_TAKEN%
template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-2 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Georgia', serif;} .qsm-certificate-templ-2 {padding: 20px; height: 300px;} .certificate-title {font-size: 50px !important; padding: 0 !important; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; background: linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 20px; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 15px 0;} .recipient-name {font-size: 36px; margin: 10px 0; color: #daa520; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold;} .achievement-text {font-size: 20px !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 0;} .achievement-category {font-size: 24px !important; font-weight: bold; color: #daa520;} .award-date {font-size: 18px; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; text-align: left; margin-left: 80px; margin-top: 70px;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #daa520;}

template_content:
Certificate of Excellence

Awarded to

%FULL_NAME%

This certificate is awarded in recognition of outstanding dedication, effort, and achievement. Your hard work and perseverance have led to this well-deserved success. We celebrate your commitment to excellence and congratulate you on this remarkable accomplishment.

Awarded on: %DATE_TAKEN%
template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-2 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Georgia', serif; height: 300px;} .qsm-certificate-templ-2 {padding: 20px; height: 300px;} .certificate-title {font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 50px !important; padding: 0 !important; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; background: linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 2px solid #135e96; width: 80%;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 30px !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 15px 0;} .recipient-name {font-size: 36px; margin: 10px 0; color: ##353044; font-weight: bold;} .achievement-text {font-size: 20px !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; width: 480px; margin: auto; margin-top: 15px;} .award-date {font-size: 18px; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; text-align: right; margin-top: 175px;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #353044;}

template_content:
CERTIFICATE OF APPRECIATION

This is to certify that

%FULL_NAME%

Your enthusiasm, effort, and dedication have been truly inspiring. This achievement reflects your commitment to learning and growth. Keep striving for excellence in all your future endeavors!

Awarded on: %DATE_TAKEN%
template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-3 {text-align: right; font-family: 'sans-serif'; margin-right: 40px; height: 300px;} .qsm-certificate-templ-3 {padding: 20px;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 2px solid #D99156; width: 60%; margin-left: 41%; margin-top: -10px; } .certificate-title {font-family: 'sans-serif'; font-size: 30px !important; margin: 0; color: #121212; font-weight: bold;} .certificate-subtitle {font-family: 'sans-serif'; font-size: 22px !important; color: #333; margin: 10px 0;} .recipient-name {font-family: Edwardian Script ITC; font-size: 60px; margin: 10px 0; color: #121212; font-style: italic;} .achievement-text {font-size: 20px; color: #555; margin: 15px 0; margin-left: 41%; text-align: right;} .award-date { font-family: 'sans-serif'; font-size: 16px; color: #121212; } .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #121212;}

template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-2 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Georgia', serif; height: 300px;} .qsm-certificate-templ-2 {padding: 20px; height: 300px;} .certificate-title {font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 50px !important; padding: 0 !important; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; color: brown;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 2px solid #135e96; width: 80%;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 30px !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 15px 0;} .recipient-name {font-size: 36px; margin: 10px 0; color: brown; font-weight: bold;} .achievement-text {font-size: 20px !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; width: 480px; margin: auto; margin-top: 15px;} .award-date {font-size: 18px; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; text-align: left; margin-top: 150px;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: brown;}

template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-4 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Bahnschrift'; height: 300px;} .qsm-certificate-templ-4 {padding: 20px; margin-top: 10px;} .certificate-title {font-size: 40px; margin: 0; color: #2C3E50; font-weight: bold;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 25px; color: #4a4a4a; margin: 0;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 2px solid #D99156; width: 60%; margin-top: -25px; } .recipient-name {font-size: 30px; margin-top: 30px; color: #00A8B5; font-style: italic;} .achievement-text {font-size: 20px; color: #555; margin: 10px 0;} .award-date {font-size: 18px; text-align: left; margin-left: 60px; margin-top: 65px;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #2C3E50;}

template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-4 {text-align: center; font-family: math; height: 300px;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 2px solid #f7002b; width: 20px; margin-top: -40px; } .qsm-certificate-templ-4 {padding: 20px; margin: 0px;} .certificate-title {font-size: 70px !important; margin: 0; padding: 0 !important; line-height: 0 !important; color: #2c3e50; font-weight: bold;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 30px !important; color: #4a4a4a; margin: 15px 0; font-family: math;} .recipient-name {font-family: math; font-size: 40px; margin: 10px 0; color: #d63638; } .achievement-text {font-family: math; font-size: 20px; color: #555; margin: 20px 0; width: 500px; margin: auto;} .award-date {font-family: math; font-size: 20px; text-align: right; color: #555; margin-top: 50px;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #d63638;}
